EmailTemplate.description: CASS Joining Process. Welcome new GSSA or Airline
EmailTemplate.name: CASS_Joining_New_GSSA
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to CASS {!Case.BSPCountry__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We are pleased to give a warm welcome to {!Account.Name} joining CASS {!Case.BSPCountry__c}. CASS would enable {!Account.Name} to monitor many cargo operations, as well as to retrieve the periodical reports furnished by IATA.
Official CASS Start Date is {!Case.Change_effective_as_of__c}.
Find below your login credentials to access CASSLink.
User: Password:
Airline {!Account.Name} have added to your user with code Insert main code or branch one.
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to log a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.org/customer. These queries will be answered with the highest priority. Yours sincerely,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Global Airline Participation Team
